Package aom.scripting.xs.ai

Class Communication

Object
Communication
public class Communication
extends Object
This class provides a collection of AI commands concerning Communication. An AI can not send a random chat message to human players, only predefined messages. It can communicate with other AIs using a strict protocol.
Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
